column1: Kaikalur mandal is one of the 50 mandals in Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. The headquarters of this mandal is located at Kaikalur town. The mandal is bordered by West Godavari district to both north and east
column2: Kalidindi mandal to the south and Mudinepalle mandal and Mandavalli mandal to the west.
